sentences.en: Allocate - How you designate number of credits to your site.
sentences.cn: 分配 – 你为你的网页分配积分的方式.

sentences.en: Allocate the analysis of the price to the multinational inner part.
sentences.cn: 对跨国内部调拨价格的分析.

sentences.en: Cannot allocate database object - database would exceed its disk quota.
sentences.cn: 不能分配数据库对象 —— 数据库将超过它的磁盘限额.

sentences.en: Financial Planners can allocate budgets by organisation element or internal budget codes.
sentences.cn: 财务规划可以拨出预算由组织元素或内部预算代码.

sentences.en: I feel that we should allocate some money to improve the company's recreational facilities.
sentences.cn: 我感到我们应该分配一些钱用于改进公司的娱乐设施.

sentences.en: I will do my own evaluation and allocate the bonuses to each person.
sentences.cn: 我有我自己给每人评价和分配红利的办法.

sentences.en: Marxism economics has two kinds of different income to allocate theory.
sentences.cn: 马克思主义经济学有两种不同的收入分配理论.

sentences.en: The district allocate pipeline pure water, can look at system of talkbacking.
sentences.cn: 小区配备管道纯净水, 可视对讲系统.

sentences.en: They intend to allocate more places to mature students this year.
sentences.cn: 今年他们打算给成人学生提供更多的名额。

sentences.en: They will allocate fund for housing.
They will allocate funds to you if you requisition it.
sentences.cn: 如果你提出书面申请,他们就会拨给你资金.

sentences.en: This agency agreement cover only the territory allocate to you.
sentences.cn: 该代理协议只适用于指定给你们的地区.

sentences.en: Tickets are limited and will be allocated to those who apply first.
sentences.cn: 票数有限，将分配给那些先申请的人。

sentences.en: We allocate 10 % of revenue to publicity.
sentences.cn: 我们拨出10%的收入做广告.

sentences.en: We'll have to allocate plenty of space for that.
sentences.cn: 这个产品应该多占些位置.

sentences.en: You must allocate the money carefully.
sentences.cn: 你们必须谨慎地分配钱.

trans.tran_en: to use something for a particular purpose, give something to a particular person etc, especially after an official decision has been made

trans.tran_cn: 分配， 分派， 把…拨给
trans.tran_en: to use something for a particular purpose, give something to a particular person etc, especially after an official decision has been made
